short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks prompts entered for AI image generation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AI Prompt Tracker is a browser extension that captures and stores prompts entered by users for AI image generation. The primary goal of the AI Prompt Tracker is to capture, store, and manage prompts that users input into AI-driven image generation tools. This ensures users have a historical record of their interactions with the AI and can revisit or analyze their prompts at any time.
